Uses of Package
com.hyprmx.android.sdk

Classes in com.hyprmx.android.sdk used by com.hyprmx.android.sdk
HyprMXBanner
          Represents a banner that fits the width of the provided space in whatever layout it's inserted that can display ad content as received from the HyprMX API.
HyprMXButton
          Represents a relatively small button that can display ad content as received from the HyprMX API.
HyprMXButton.ButtonSize
           
HyprMXHelper
          Provides the public interface to the ad request API for performing all HyprMX ad-related functions.
HyprMXHelper.HyprMXListener
          Interface for clients to implement to receive notification when offers are completed or cancelled by the user.
HyprMXHelper.HyprMXPriority
          The priority at which HyprMX worker threads should execute.
HyprMXHelper.HyprMXThrowable
          Base throwable object.
